com.compendium.io.html
Class HTMLViews

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.io.html.HTMLViews
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIConstants
public class HTMLViews
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUIConstants

This class handles the creation of HTML Views exports which include image maps for each map view exported.

Author:
? / Michelle Bachler

Constructor Detail

HTMLViews

public HTMLViews(java.lang.String directory,
                 java.lang.String fileName,
                 java.lang.String userTitle,
                 boolean bIncludeReferences,
                 boolean bToZip,
                 boolean bSortMenu,
                 boolean addMapTitles,
                 boolean openInNew,
                 boolean bNoDetailPopup,
                 boolean bNoDetailPopupAtAll)
Constructor.

Parameters:
directory - java.lang.String, the directory to export to.
fileName - java.lang.String, the name of the file to export to.
userTitle - java.lang.String, the title for the main export file.
bIncludeReferences - boolean, export any associated reference and image files.
bToZip - boolean, export all files to a zip file.
addMapTitles - indicates whether to add titles to map and list pages.
openInNew - indicates whether external urls file or images should be opened in a new window ot not.
bNoDetailPopup - whether to exclude the detail popups for nodes with only anchor id info in them.
bNoDetailPopupAtAll - whether to exclude the detail popups totally from this export.
Method Detail

checkProgress

private boolean checkProgress()
Checks if the user has requested to cancel the export.

Returns:
boolean, true if the progress has been cancelled, else false.

private java.lang.String createFileName(View view)
Create the filename for the given view.

Parameters:
view - the view to create the filename for.
Returns:

processViews

public void processViews(java.util.Vector selectedViews,
                         boolean bOpenAfter)
This method sets up the progress bar and then loops through the given list of views creating the relevant HTML pages and addint each view the the side menu. Finally it write out the main file, or exports to zip fi required.

Parameters:
selectedViews - the list of views to export.
bOpenAfter - Open the html page after completion.

processViewsWithXML

public void processViewsWithXML(java.util.Vector selectedViews,
                                java.lang.String sXMLZipFile)
This method sets up the progress bar and then loops through the given list of views creating the relevant HTML pages and adding each view the the side menu. Finally it write out the main file, or exports to zip if required and includes the XML zip given.

Parameters:
selectedViews - the list of views to export.
sXMLZipFile - the file name of the xml zip to include.

createHTML

public void createHTML(View view,
                       java.lang.String sFileName)
Calls the appropriate method to process the given view as a list of a map, depending on its node type.

Parameters:
view - the view to process.
the - filename for the main map file for this view.
See Also:
processMap(com.compendium.core.datamodel.View, java.lang.String), processList(com.compendium.core.datamodel.View, java.lang.String)

processMap

private void processMap(View view,
                        java.lang.String sFileName)
Process the export of a map view and create the HTML text require for the page. This includes obtaining a jpg image of the map, and createing the Image Map HTML required.

Parameters:
view - the map view to process.
the - filename for the main map file for this view.

processList

private void processList(View view,
                         java.lang.String sFileName)
Process the export of a list view and create the HTML text require for the page.

Parameters:
view - com.compendium.datamodel.View, the list view to process.
the - filename for the main map file for this view.

private java.lang.String createHintDiv(java.lang.String sID,

Create a div for a rollover hint message.

Parameters:
sID - the div id.

Returns:
the final div html string.

setupFileHeader

private java.lang.String setupFileHeader(java.lang.String sTitle)
Create the header html text for the Image Map file. This includes an style information and javascript functions.

Parameters:
sTitle - java.lang.String, the title of the the map.
Returns:
java.lang.String, the created HTML text.

mapOkay

private View mapOkay(java.lang.String nodeID)
This method takes the name of the map and checks that it is on the selected maps list.

Parameters:
nodeLabel - the id of the node to check.
Returns:
boolean true if it is on the list of selected nodes, else false.

calculateCoords

private void calculateCoords(UINode node)
Calculates all the positions of the node UI elements for the node on the IMAGE map. This includes: The icon dimension, the label dimension, the '*' (more detail) rollover dimension, the 'T' (has tags) rollover dimension, the parent view indicator rollover dimension.

Parameters:
node - com.compendium.ui.UINode, the node to make these caluclations for.

createDetailFile

private int createDetailFile(java.lang.String detPath,
                             java.lang.String htmlPath,
                             NodeSummary node,
                             java.lang.String sViewID)
Creates the HTML for the popup file with the given node detail pages, label, codes, and references. If not zipping up, writes the HTML to a file, else stores the data for later.

Parameters:
detPath - java.lang.String, the path to write the detail file to.
htmlPath - java.lang.String, the path to put in the HTML - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
node - com.compendium.datamodel.NodeSummary, the node to create the detail page for.
sViewID - the view id of the view this node is in.

writeMenuPage

public boolean writeMenuPage()
Close headers and FileWrite the menu page out to file if not zipping up. If zipping up store the file data for later.

Returns:
boolean, currently not used, always returns true.

createImageFile

private void createImageFile(java.lang.String path,
                             java.lang.String nPath)
Move the passed image with the given 'path' to the export 'nPath'. Unless zipping up when it is stored for later.

Parameters:
path - the current image path.
nPath - the path to move the image to.

zipUpExport

private void zipUpExport(java.lang.String fileName)
Zip up the export and its associated directories.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the zip file to export to.

addFilesFromExistingZip

public java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream addFilesFromExistingZip(java.io.File zipFile)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
For the Export with Outline, Maps and XML all in one, where the zip file will already exist from Outline export. Create a temp file and add the existing zipped files to the new zip.

Parameters:
zipFile - the name of the existing zip file.
Returns:
a reference to the new zip still open to finish adding to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
